clean-architecture-highlighter.severityL.description: The severity level of the diagnostic messages shown in the editor.

clean-architecture-highlighter.layers.do.description: Configuration for the Domain layer. Defines rules and identification patterns for core business logic.

aliases.description: List of path aliases or glob patterns that identify this layer (e.g., '@/domain/*', 'src/core/*').

allowedDependencies.description: List of layers that the Domain layer is permitted to import from. Usually empty in Clean Architecture.

clean-architecture-highlighter.layers.ap.description: Configuration for the Application layer. Defines rules for use cases and application services.

aliases.description: List of path aliases or glob patterns that identify this layer.

allowedDependencies.description: List of layers that the Application layer is permitted to import from (e.g., ['domain']).

clean-architecture-highlighter.layers.in.description: Configuration for the Infrastructure layer. Defines rules for external tools, databases, and frameworks.

aliases.description: List of path aliases or glob patterns that identify this layer.

allowedDependencies.description: List of layers that the Infrastructure layer is permitted to import from (e.g., ['domain', 'application']).

clean-architecture-highlighter.sourceFol.description: The source folder relative to the workspace root.

scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
